subtasks: Identify direct marketing options (roadside stands, pick-your-own, online platforms, CSA, farmers markets)
Determine location for roadside stands (well-traveled, near population center, good visibility, safety considerations, amenities)
Consider purchasing additional produce for roadside stands from other farmers if necessary
Plan for customer harvesting in pick-your-own operations (crop selection, location flexibility, safety facilities, additional insurance)
Utilize online marketing channels (website, social media, etc.) for direct sales
Explore community-supported agriculture (CSA) model for customer engagement and produce distribution
Assess farmers market participation (advantages, disadvantages, necessary preparations)
